Sentencas: Glass ceramic seals have been widely used in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Improvement of thermal cycle stability of YSZ-glass composite seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the sealing performance of seals is a big challenge for SOFC operating at high temperature.
Titulo: Improvement of thermal cycle stability of YSZ-glass composite seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this work, the gas tightness, chemical compatibility and thermal cycle stability of the glass-based seals with various proportions of YSZ and glass are evaluated and discussed.
Titulo: Improvement of thermal cycle stability of YSZ-glass composite seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The study showed that when 20 wt% YSZ is added to H4 glass, the as-prepared glass ceramic seal (denoted as H4-20) exhibited extremely low leakage rate of 0.00171 sccm cm-1 under input pressure of 20.7 kPa and wide temperature range from 650 degrees C to 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Improvement of thermal cycle stability of YSZ-glass composite seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, the leakage rate of H4-20 glass ceramic seal below 0.004 sccm cm-1 was obtained after 10 thermal cycles at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Improvement of thermal cycle stability of YSZ-glass composite seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The SEM analysis indicated that the H4-20 glass ceramic seal could form well bonding interface between the interconnect/seal/ cell.
Titulo: Improvement of thermal cycle stability of YSZ-glass composite seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The above results prove the possibility of the H4-20 glass ceramic seals to be considered for intermediate temperature SOFC application.
Titulo: Improvement of thermal cycle stability of YSZ-glass composite seals for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell
